version_description: Zinnia is all new! The most creative way to document the things that matter most to you. Keep a diary or daily journal. Set up habit trackers. Make a collage. Enjoy an even more dynamic drawing experience with the Apple Pencil. Have fun and get growing with Zinnia!

This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements, to enhance the journaling experience and bring you greater app stability. Happy journaling <3

Zinnia is all new! The most creative way to document the things that matter most to you. Keep a diary or daily journal. Set up habit trackers. Make an awesome planner or collage. Enjoy an even more dynamic drawing experience with the Apple Pencil. Have fun and get growing with Zinnia!

= = = = =

There are so many cool new features in Zinnia 1.1!

- Ungroup templates, handpick your favorite elements, and use them to enhance the composition of your spreads. Ungrouping lets you easily rearrange template headers and make aesthetic tweaks to suit your tastes.
- Adjust the opacity of all content for awesome layering effects.
- Moving, deleting, printing and exporting pages and entire journals has been made easier. The new UI puts these actions right at your fingertips.
- A dynamic brush preview that lets you see both brush size and opacity before you begin work! Now, it’s way easier to dial-in on the look you want.
- Drag and drop images, SVG files, and text from other apps directly into your journal spreads.

The new refinements to Zinnia make it that much easier to journal mindfully.

This update includes some exciting new features and improvements!

- the ability to change color of single-color content
- "new" labels for newly added Studio content
- UI improvements with locked objects
- improvements to auto-zooming when typing on a page
- updated support for keyboards and trackpads including Apple's new Magic Keyboard
- many back-end enhancements to improve app performance
- Apple Pencil improvements

We recently released tons of new July content, so definitely check out those fun additions, too. Happy journaling :)

This latest update includes a variety of bug fixes and performance improvements.

We have also added hundreds of new stickers, templates, washi tape and other content to Zinnia's Studio. So have fun, and happy journaling!
This update fixes an issue with the copy/paste menu not showing when certain device accessibility settings are enabled.

Our latest update includes several new features that were requested by you - our beautiful Zinnia community.

- Line smoothing for brushes, to make your handwriting look pro
- A trash bin, so deleted journals and pages can be restored
- Pinch-to-zoom for a single-page view of your journal
- Dozens of new journal covers to choose from
- The ability to change color and opacity for multiple objects simultaneously
- Improved experience with selecting layered objects

This update also includes a variety of bug fixes, performance enhancements, and back-end improvements to make your creative journaling experience even better. Happy journaling :)

Zinnia is now available on your iPhone! Zinnia's companion iPhone version means more mobile access to all your favorite features: brushes, editing tools, the Studio, and more. Essentially, everything you loved on your iPad now fits into your pocket.

With Zinnia’s iPhone version you can:

– Sync your iPad and iPhone journals via iCloud
– Fully access all of Zinnia’s tools and Studio library
– Read, review, and edit your journals anytime, anywhere

Psst... there are more iPhone-specific features and capabilities coming soon!

This app update also includes bug fixes, performance improvements, and Apple Pencil updates for the iPad.
